desc: No, we don't have monkeys, but we do have awesome, all natural products like candles, lip balms, bath salts, essential oils and so much more. This is our website. Click the link.

layout.text: We are a family who suffers from minor skin problems - We want to fix that - Our products are inspired by our needs - We value a short ingredient list - You won't find harsh chemicals or unpronounceable names in the products we make - We feel confident in using our products on our family - We want to share them with you as well - We love our products and hope that you will too!
